TextEng: I am here only to destroy you, evil creature!
Text: 널 파괴하러 왔을 뿐이야, 사악한 놈!

TextEng: You try to kill me and then wish to speak?
Why should I want to speak with you?
I do not wish to share my name with you.
I have no questions for you.
Are you interested in making a deal?
<StartAction>[Pull out tower crystal.]</Start> Do you know what this crystal is?
Text: <StartAction>[탑 수정을 꺼낸다.]</Start> 이 수정이 뭔지 알아?

TextEng: Why do you need to hold it?
I don't think so. It is important.
Text: 안 될 것 같아. 중요한 거거든.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Quickly put it away.]</Start> Uh, never mind. I have a different question.
Text: <StartAction>[재빨리 치운다.]</Start> 어, 됐어. 다른 질문이 있어.

TextEng: Why do you hate the Bedine so much?
I do not care for such things.
Someday I will forge a kingdom.
They shall build monuments to me, someday.
Text: 언젠가 날 위한 기념비를 세울 거야.

TextEng: I will have riches beyond belief.
Text: 믿을 수 없는 부를 갖게 될 거야.

TextEng: Not so powerful that they survived though.
There are kings and tyrants, but I serve none of them.
Text: 왕도 있고 폭군도 있지만, 난 아무도 섬기지 않아.

TextEng: Tell me your version of the story.
You mean the rod I stole?
Why would you bind it to a rod?
This is pretty much exactly what the Bedine told me.
And now I have the rod they placed your soul in.
Text: 그리고 이제 네 영혼을 넣은 지팡이가 내 손에 있어.

TextEng: Enough, I want to ask you about something else.
Hurry up and finish your story.
No. I will not betray them.
Yes, if it is worth my while.
They are not my friends. I merely sought water from them.
Text: 그들은 내 친구가 아니야. 그냥 물을 구하러 갔을 뿐이야.

TextEng: What do I get for doing this?
I changed my mind. I think I will destroy you instead.
I want to ask something else.
I do not wish to answer that.
No, I used him for my own purposes and left when he had nothing more to give.
Text: 아니, 내 목적을 위해 이용하고 더 이상 줄 게 없으면 떠났어.

TextEng: He was a good teacher, but I had no feelings for him.
There was no mentor in my life.
Yes. He was a good teacher.
Yes, there is truth in what you say.
You have your opinions; I have mine.
Text: 넌 네 의견이 있고, 난 내 의견이 있어.

TextEng: The Bedine said the creature was combating your evil.
Text: 베다인은 그 생명체가 네 악을 막고 있다고 했어.

TextEng: Why should I believe this phaerimm was evil?
Text: 왜 이 페어림이 악하다고 믿어야 해?

TextEng: You spoke of research; I thought you were trying to take over the world.
Text: 연구에 대해 말했는데, 세계를 정복하려 한 줄 알았어.
